Statute.Title: Income Tax Conventions Interpretation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Interprétation des conventions en matière d’impôts sur le revenu, Loi sur l’)

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 48 (1st Supp.) in force 29.10.85 see also ss. 2(1)
CIF, 1991, c. 49, s. 220 in force on assent 17.12.91
CIF, 1993, c. 24, ss. 147 and 148 in force on assent 10.06.93
CIF, 1998, c. 19, ss. 286 and 287 in force on assent 18.06.96 see also ss. 286(2) and 287(2) re application
CIF, 1999, c. 22, ss. 84 to 86 in force on assent 17.06.99
CIF, 2005, c. 19, s. 60 in force on assent 13.05.2005
CIF, 2007, c. 35, s. 70 in force on assent 14.12.2007. See s. 70(2) re application
CIF, 2013, c. 34, s. 26(2) in force on assent 26.06.2013; s. 26(1) deemed to have come into force 05.03.2010 see s. 26(2)
